channel.title: T. Kingfisher on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in T. Kingfisher on Strat

item.title: Nettle & Bone
item.description: Feels like an Arthurian legend, a mix of fairy tales but grounded in a reality somewhat like our own with some fantastical twists layered into it. Christ is implied to have existed in this universe so that’s a little confusing. Where and when are we then? But it feels like an alternate fantastical reality. Inverting tropes: instead of a prince saving a princess, the princess wants to kill the prince and save her sister.
